com.rastkosprojects.springbootecommerce.dao

Interface ProductRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<com.rastkosprojects.springbootecommerce.entity.Product,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<com.rastkosprojects.springbootecommerce.entity.Product,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<com.rastkosprojects.springbootecommerce.entity.Product,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<com.rastkosprojects.springbootecommerce.entity.Product>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<com.rastkosprojects.springbootecommerce.entity.Product,java.lang.Long>

    @CrossOrigin(value="http://localhost:4200")
public interface ProductRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<com.rastkosprojects.springbootecommerce.entity.Product,java.lang.Long>
    Interface which represents the DAO to the Product objects. Spring Data REST scans the repository and automatically opens endpoints.
    Author:
    rastko

    • Method Detail

      • findByCategoryId

        org.springframework.data.domain.Page<com.rastkosprojects.springbootecommerce.entity.Product> findByCategoryId(@RequestParam(value="id")
                                                                                                              java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                              org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        Query method because it starts with find by. Matches by category id. Behind the scenes, Spring executes a statement like: SELECT * FROM product WHERE category_id=? Spring Data REST will also expose the endpoint for: http://localhost:8080/api/products/search/findByCategory?id=2
        Parameters:
        id - id in Long type, which represents category id
        pageable - enables pagination

      • findByNameContaining

        org.springframework.data.domain.Page<com.rastkosprojects.springbootecommerce.entity.Product> findByNameContaining(@RequestParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                  java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                  org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        Executes a statement like: SELECT * FROM product WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',:name,'%')
        Parameters:
        name - name to search by
        pageable - enables pagination
